msg: Added some more tests. Compiles, but I have not checked if the tests

author: bayard
msg: Fix a bug as noticed by Paulo Gaspar in indexOfAny.
There was no checking to see if the temporary was a -1.
Also added an optimisation that uses Integer.MAX_VALUE with the belief
that this is an impossible index for a java.lang.String.

author: dlr
msg: Added check for null in replace() core method.
